Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited's International Markets Team is pleased to offer for sale 438 Gamma Avenue, Burnaby, BC (the "Property"), a fully-furnished, 30-suite student-living rental building located nearby Simon Fraser University (SFU) in the Burnaby Heights neighbourhood of Metro Vancouver. With a residential net leasable area of 21,001 sq.ft, the offering is available for purchase as 30 separately-titled strata condominiums allowing for flexibility in future dispositions. The Property is currently professionally managed by Global Educations Cities (GEC) and is fully leased on fixed-term leases allowing for the owner to efficiently turnover suites and mark-to-market rental revenue. The Property's proximity to multiple educational institutes, its central location and convenient access to the R5 Hastings Rapid Bus (traveling between downtown Vancouver and Simon Fraser University), and the abundant amenity and services along Hastings Street, makes 438 Gamma Avenue an attractive residence for the increasing number of international students and demand for off-campus student accommodations. Although not directly on Burnaby Mountain, the Property is well-positioned along Hastings Street with direct access by bus rapid transit (R5 line) to both SFU's Downtown Vancouver campus (30 minutes) and SFU's Burnaby Mountain campus (20 minutes). It is also an ideal turnkey option for corporate-stays, internships, and new residents to the Vancouver-area that are looking for summer or month-to-month accommodations.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FULLY LEASED 30-UNIT STUDENT-ORIENTED RENTAL BUILDING ALONG BUS RAPID TRANSIT CORRIDOR AT THE FOOT OF BURNABY MOUNTAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The CBRE National Apartment Group and CBRE Investment Properties Group are pleased to present a 100% freehold interest in the Cedar Park Apartments located at 118 West 18th Street, North Vancouver, which is just west of the intersection of Lonsdale Avenue and West 18th Street. The property is improved with a 21 suite apartment building (6 bachelors, 12 one-bedrooms, and 3 two-bedrooms) located in the highly desirable and growing area ofCentral Lonsdale.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | The Cedar Park Apartments

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located off Lonsdale Avenue, along East 3rd Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE in conjunction with Angell Hasman & Associates is pleased to present this exclusive opportunity to invest in a portfolio of 18 residential condominium units at the Anchor: 131 East 3rd Street in Lower Lonsdale, North Vancouver. The Portfolio is located just off Lonsdale Avenue along East 3rd in the Lower Lonsdale neighbourhood of North Vancouver, British Columbia. Lower Lonsdale is currently going through a large waterfront renewal process; the old shipyards are being torn down, making way for new public spaces, condominiums, retail outlets and a hotel. The Property offers ease of access by major bus routes and the nearby SeaBus terminal at Lonsdale Quay. Area tenancies include Joey Restaurants, Browns Socialhouse, Fishworks, Tap & Barrel, Larry’s Market, Lonsdale Quay Market, Burgoo Bistro, Buddha-Full, etc.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: THE ANCHOR | 131 EAST 3RD STREET, NORTH VANCOUVER

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: North East corner of Clark Drive and East 8th Avenue

Personal Real Estate Corporation

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: North East corner of Clark Drive and East 8th Avenue

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to offer the opportunity to acquire a 24,642 sq. ft. development site with further opportunity to assemble the adjacent lots as well as the City Lane. Designated for 3.6 FSR / 10-storey residential development, the offering offers a rare opportunity to build just under 100,000 square feet of residential at the start of Vancouver’s most anticipated transit corridor, the Broadway-Arbutus Millennium Line extension. The site is located just 300 meters away from VCC-Clark Station which will be the first station along the future Broadway Line. The site itself is well positioned on the crest of a hill offering phenomenal views of Downtown Vancouver, and the North Shore Mountains.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 10-STOREY MULTI-FAMILY DEVELOPMENT SITE WITH FURTHER ASSEMBLY OPPORTUNITY

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text: Associate Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the rare opportunity to acquire a luxury multifamily asset, with commercial at grade, in Vancouver’s Chinatown district. The asset consist of four luxury residential units and one commercial unit that is currently tenanted by a cocktail bar. The property will provide a stable income stream from the current lease agreements and owner leasebacks. There is the flexibility for a buyer to occupy one unit as a private residence. The penthouse suite has a full rooftop patio with, pool, hot tub, outdoor kitchen, and many other amenities. The property has achieved strong revenue from short term rentals, executive rentals, filming revenue, and other supplementary income.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Rare Opportunity to Acquire a Luxury Multifamily Asset

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire 1131 Barclay Street (the "Property"), a unique and well-maintained character apartment building centrally located in the desirable West End neighborhood of Vancouver's amenity-rich Downtown core.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | WELL - MAINTAINED CHARACTER APARTMENT BUILDING

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of CBRE Limited, The International Markets team is pleased to offer for sale two distinct properties nestled in Vancouver’s famous Kitsilano neighbourhood. Both buildings have significantly benefited from a very high duty of care and constant maintenance. The majority of suites have been renovated and upgraded with tenant turnover. The roof, building envelope, windows, carpet / tiling in common areas, fire systems, and parkade membrane have been upgraded or replaced regularly. Ocean Place is located at 2280 Cornwall Avenue primely located on the waterfront of Vancouver’s famous Kitsilano Beach. The property is one of the few multi-family buildings featuring unencumbered views of English Bay, Kitsilano Beach and the North Shore mountains. The property is improved by a three storey multi-family building with 24 suites featuring 2.5 levels of underground parking featuring 32 car stalls, 14 motorcycle stalls, bike storage, elevator access, with meticulously maintained premises. The property sits on a lot measuring 100’x120’ offering a defensive position for future long term redevelopment. Pine Place is located at 2775 Pine Street located on the northwest corner of Pine Street and West 12th Avenue in Vancouver’s Fairview neighbourhood. The property is improved with three storey multi-family building with 20 suites featuring 1.5 levels secured underground parking featuring 20 underground car stalls, 3 motorcycle stalls, 2 surface car stalls, bike storage, elevator access and balconies. The property sits on a lot measuring 100’x125’ offering future development potential under the highly anticipated Broadway Subway Plan.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | PRIME KITSILANO BREACHFRONT AND BROADWAY CORRIDOR MULTI-FAMILY APARTMENTS

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the corner of Oak Street and West 64th Avenue

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present the unique opportunity to acquire 8029-8225 Oak Street (“the Site”), an exceptionally well-located corner residential redevelopment site within walking distance of the Marine Drive SkyTrain Station. With 600 feet of frontage along Oak Street, the Site is prominently situated within the heart of the Marpole neighbourhood within Vancouver West. Centrally located between downtown Vancouver and the Vancouver Airport (YVR), the Site offers excellent accessibility throughout Metro Vancouver. The Site is only a 15-minute walk from the Canada Line Skytrain, and Oak Street is a major North-South connector, linking the Fairview community in the North and the Oak Street Bridge in the South leading to Richmond. This development opportunity offers the potential to build multi-family residential within a premium, sought-after location in Vancouver West, with the potential to yield a maximum of 170,975 square feet (up to 2.50x FSR). The Site is strategically structured as two assemblies, offering a potential purchaser flexibility as well as the opportunity to purchase the shares of the bare trust nominee corporations. The site is currently improved with 12 single-family homes, providing stable holding income during the redevelopment process.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | WEST SIDE REDEVELOPMENT SITE

Vice President
Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited’s Investment Specialists are pleased to present the 628 Gibsons Way in Gibsons, known as Seaview Plaza, (the “Property”). The Property has a lot size of 51,021 square feet and is currently improved with 25,780square feet building consisting of 13 residential and 9 commercial units which is 100% leased in Gibson’s Town Centre. The Property is also currently professionally managed and well taken care of. The Property has ample parking and promotes high traffic for locals and tourists, with a stunning natural environment surrounded by an array of commercial and recreational amenities. Steps from shoreline, Seaview Plaza offers an “island-living” lifestyle, close to marina and hiking trails. The opportunity is to purchase a current income producing Property which offers the ability to develop a second incoming producing building facing the ocean, or redevelop the entire property in the future.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | MIXED-USE INCOME PRODUCING PROPERTY WITH FUTURE ADD VALUE POTENTIAL TO BUILD SECOND BUILDING ON LOT

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: By Cook Street and Fairfield Road

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The CBRE Investment Properties Group is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase a 6 suite, care-free investment opportunity. The property has been meticulously maintained and has had zero vacancy in the past 15+ years. The property is located in the heart of Cook Street Village, a lively and quaint shopping district with an abundance of cafes, restaurants and boutique shops and services.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Investment Properties Group is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase a well maintained walk up apartment building with 14 one bed suites, and an adjacent duplex withtwo 2 bedroom suites on Superior Street in James Bay. Both offer holding income as well as joint redevelopment potential, with a combined 15,789 sf of land situated in proximity to many recently developed high density residential projects.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Investment Properties Group is pleased to present the opportunity to purchase a well maintained 36 suite apartment building on Gorge Road West. With an excellent suite mix of bachelor, one and two bedroom suites this building has been meticulously maintained with renovations to 9 units. The building is located on a large site with additional density available offering the opportunity to intensify. The property is well positioned in an area with substantial growth and development, with plans to incorporate a number of residential and commercial buildingsin the neighbourhood.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 36 Suite Apartment Building; Upside in Rental Income & Site Intensificaiton
